com.edugility.objexj.engine
Class MatchResult<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.edugility.objexj.engine.MatchResult<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of Object the matching Thread works with
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MatchResult<T>
extends Object
implements Serializable

The result of a Thread that has successfully matched its input.

Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
Thread.match(), Serialized Form

Method Summary
 List<? extends T> getGroup(Object key)
          Returns a List of items captured as a capture group under the supplied key.
 int getGroupCount()
          Returns the total number of capture groups present in this MatchResult.
 Set<?> getGroupKeySet()
          Returns an unmodifiable Set of Objects representing valid keys that can be used to capture groups.
 Object getVariable(Object key)
          Returns the value of a variable indexed under the supplied key.
 Map<?,?> getVariables()
          Returns an unmodifiable Map of the variables set on the Thread that this MatchResult wraps.
 boolean lookingAt()
          Returns true if the underlying Thread supplied at construction time has a state of Thread.State.MATCH.
 boolean matches()
          Returns true if the lookingAt() method returns true and if the underlying Thread was at the end of its input when the match occurred.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

matches

public boolean matches()
Returns true if the lookingAt() method returns true and if the underlying Thread was at the end of its input when the match occurred.

Returns:
true if the lookingAt() method returns true and if the underlying Thread was at the end of its input when the match occurred.

lookingAt

public boolean lookingAt()
Returns true if the underlying Thread supplied at construction time has a state of Thread.State.MATCH.

Returns:
true if the underlying Thread supplied at construction time has a state of Thread.State.MATCH.

getGroup

public List<? extends T> getGroup(Object key)
Returns a List of items captured as a capture group under the supplied key.

This method may return null.

Parameters:
key - the key of the capture group List to return; may be null
Returns:
a List of items captured, or null if there is no such List
See Also:
Thread.getGroup(Object)

getGroupCount

public int getGroupCount()
Returns the total number of capture groups present in this MatchResult.

Returns:
the total number of capture groups present in this MatchResult; always an int greater than or equal to 0
See Also:
getGroup(Object), Thread.getGroupCount()

getGroupKeySet

public Set<?> getGroupKeySet()
Returns an unmodifiable Set of Objects representing valid keys that can be used to capture groups.

This method never returns null.

Returns:
a non-null Set of keys each element of which can be used as an argument to the getGroup(Object) method

getVariable

public Object getVariable(Object key)
Returns the value of a variable indexed under the supplied key.

This method may return null.

Parameters:
key - the name of the variable; may be null
Returns:
the value of the variable, or null if there is no such variable
See Also:
getVariables()

getVariables

public Map<?,?> getVariables()
Returns an unmodifiable Map of the variables set on the Thread that this MatchResult wraps.

This method may return null.

Returns:
a Map of variables, or null
